front.title: IGP-based Source Address Validation in Intra-domain Networks (Intra-domain SAVNET)

abstract.t: This document proposes a new IGP-based intra-domain source address validation (SAV) solution, called IGP-SAVNET, which improves the accuracy upon current intra-domain SAV solutions. It allows intra- domain routers to communicate SAV-specific information using the intra-domain routing protocol or an extension to the intra-domain routing protocol. By using SAV-specific information, intra-domain routers can generate and update accurate SAV rules in an automatic way.
